mapper.sql: p_id, p_name, p_custName, p_money, p_startDay, p_endDay, p_state, p_proName, p_proPhone
mapper.insert: insert into wu.t_project (p_name, p_custName, p_money, p_startDay, p_endDay, p_state, p_proName, p_proPhone) values (#{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCustname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pStartday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pEndday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pState,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{pProname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pProphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
